item.title: Trump critic George Conway files papers for U.S. House bid in New York
item.description: George Conway is joining a crowded Democratic race in New York to succeed Rep. Jerry Nadler for his U.S. House seat.

item.title: Republicans and Democrats pitch competing plans to tackle affordability
item.description: Affordability is topic No. 1 with the midterms looming, but economists are skeptical that Congress can do much to lower prices across the board.
